abstract: Shares of Amgen had their biggest decline in seven months on Nasdaq Friday after the company reported it might revise the safety information on its biggest product.
snippet: Shares of Amgen had their biggest decline in seven months on Nasdaq Friday after the company reported it might revise the safety information on its biggest product.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Amgen had their biggest decline in seven months on Nasdaq yesterday after the company reported it might revise the safety information on its biggest product, the anemia drug Aranesp.

headline.main: Amgen Shares Fall on Safety Concerns
headline.print_headline: Amgen Shares Fall On Safety Concerns
